q1: barcelona for me is the best team in the world has shown in the last decade that is a constant team that always wins trophies
a1: The titles barcelona has one are mainly in Spain, in my opinion there are better teams then Barcelona.
q2: Barcelona is the most successful team because they've won 73 titles.
a4: They always win and play in spectacular manner.
q5: Are Barcelona better or worse without Neymar?
a5: Neymar is considered one of the top players in the world at the moment, still, they did win La Liga easily without him.
